required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Multi‐Center Investigation of Patient Acceptability of OPTI‐FREE RepleniSH® Multi-Purpose Disinfecting Solution (MPDS)
clinical_study.official_title: A 30 Day, Multi‐Centered, Open Label Study To Determine Comfort and Overall Contact Lens Wearing Experience Using OPTI‐FREE RepleniSH® MPDS as Compared to COMPLETE®MPS Easy Rub™ or ReNu MultiPlus® in Daily Wear Soft Contact Lens Patients

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study was to demonstrate that current successful fulltime daily wear soft contact lens wearers using competitive multi-purpose solutions will note improved comfort when using OPTI-FREE RepleniSH®.

primary_outcome.description: Prior to any ocular assessments at the visit, comfort ratings were collected on a questionnaire using 5-point Likert scale, with 1=Strongly Agree, 1=Agree, 3=Neutral, 4=Disagree, 5=Strongly Disagree. The percentage of participants responding with "Strongly Agree" or "Agree" for each question is presented.

Prior to any ocular assessments at the visit, comfort ratings were collected on a questionnaire using 5-point Likert scale, with 1=Strongly Agree, 1=Agree, 3=Neutral, 4=Disagree, 5=Strongly Disagree. The percentage of participants responding with "Strongly Agree" or "Agree" for each question is presented.

arm_group.description: Multi-purpose contact lens solution for cleaning and disinfecting study contact lenses used on a daily basis for 30 days.

intervention.description: OPTI‐FREE RepleniSH® used according to product labeled instructions for cleaning and disinfecting study contact lenses, 30 days.
Contact lenses per participant's habitual prescription removed nightly for cleaning and disinfecting.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
1. Participants must be between 18 and 65 years of age.
2. Must wear daily wear soft contact lenses a minimum of 8 hours per day,7 days a week.
3. Must be wearing a planned replacement soft lens in a 2 week or monthly replacement modality.
4. Must be using either COMPLETE Multi-Purpose Solution (MPS) Easy Rub or ReNu MultiPlus brand solution for at least 30 continuous days prior to enrollment.
5. Must be free of any contact lens-related symptoms with regard to comfort and vision throughout their wearing hours prior to enrollment, with the exception of end-of-day dryness not limiting all day wear.
6. Must have best corrected distance visual acuity, with contact lenses, of 20/30 or better in each eye.
7. Must be willing to maintain pre-enrollment systemic medication regimens during the study.
8. Must be willing to not use any topical medications or rewetting drops during the 30 day clinical trial duration.
9. Other protocol-defined inclusion criteria may apply.
Exclusion Criteria:
1. Has used any topical medication or rewetting drops for 7 days prior to enrollment.
2. Achieves best visual correction by monovision.
3. Has modified their systemic medications within 30 days prior to enrollment.
4. Has switched brands of cosmetics during the 30 days prior to the study.
5. Has a history of allergy to any study product ingredients.
6. Is unwilling or unable to meet the study visit timeline.
7. Has any active corneal, eyelid or other anterior segment inflammation or infection, which, in the opinion of the Investigator, would adversely affect successful contact lens wear.
8. Other protocol-defined exclusion criteria may apply.

facility.name: Alcon Call Center for Trial Locations

participant_flow.recruitment_details: Participants were recruited from 6 US study sites.

outcome.title: Comfort Ratings at Baseline
outcome.description: Prior to any ocular assessments at the visit, comfort ratings were collected on a questionnaire using 5-point Likert scale, with 1=Strongly Agree, 1=Agree, 3=Neutral, 4=Disagree, 5=Strongly Disagree. The percentage of participants responding with "Strongly Agree" or "Agree" for each question is presented.
outcome.population: 6 participants were excluded from analysis due to discontinuation of contact lens wear (1), treatment during study that might interfere with study outcome (1), withdrawal (3), and missing responses (1).

reported_events.time_frame: Adverse events were collected for the duration of the study: 1 month, 12 days.
reported_events.desc: The safety population included all enrolled and exposed participants.

certain_agreements.pi_employee: Principal Investigators are NOT employed by the organization sponsoring the study.
certain_agreements.restrictive_agreement: Alcon reserves the right of prior review of any publication or presentation of information related to the study.
